comment.author: 20361422@N00
comment._content:
Most likely at Florida and Walt Avenue, not Waits.

There is a trailer court on one side now and greenspace on the other, I bet these structures were where the greenspace is now. Cool!

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/blackdoll] Thank you for the information. Looks like "Waits" was a typo for "Walts." You'll see we've updated the catalog record. We appreciate the help!
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
